title: The Induction Motor Invention: How a 19th-Century Breakthrough Dictates 21st-Century Reliability

hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Induction Motor Invention: How a 19th-Century Breakthrough Dictates 21st-Century Reliability

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern industrial mechanical room in 2026. Two maintenance professionals, a man and a woman of diverse backgrounds, are inspecting a large, blue industrial induction motor. They are wearing full professional PPE: white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility orange vests over navy blue work uniforms. One professional is using a handheld thermal imaging camera (showing only the back of the device) to scan the motor's housing, while the other is looking at a tablet (showing only the back). The environment is clean, well-lit, and features polished concrete floors and organized conduit piping in the background. No text or logos are visible. Full body shots of the professionals.
